item.description:
Meet at Maudslay State Park at 3pm ready to ski!
Here is some info and directions.

http://www.bikekineti...

Update: Current conditions are good. Try to arrive by 2:50 so we can ski out at 3pm. The meeting place is by the entrance to the park directly across the street from the parking lot.
I am looking forward to it.
item.how_to_find_us: Maudslay State Park has a big parking lot. Buy a day pass for $2. or a MA State Park annual pass for $35-great deal! There are restrooms available and the natural setting is the best!!
item.why: This is Martin Luther King day, so perhaps you have work off and want to XC ski.
item.name: XC Skiing in Newburyport!
